eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap.name: eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap

revisions.description: Updated RBN/rbn/Rbn as ERICSSON-ROUTER/eriRouter/EriRouter to migrate RBN MIB to ERICSSON MIB.
Update DESCRIPTION clause of MODULE-IDENTITY and PRODUCT-RELEASE clause of AGENT-CAPABILITIES.
Modified PRODUCT-RELEASE clause for consistent naming. Updated CONTACT-INFO.
Added eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap3 for SMS support of BGP4 notifications.
The status of eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap1 was changed to obsolete, since the MIB is not supported on the SMS.

eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap.contactinfo: Ericsson, Inc. Postal: 100 Headquarters Dr. San Jose, CA 95134 USA Phone: +1 408 750 5000 Fax: +1 408 750 5599
eriRouterIetfBgp4Cap.description: The Agent Capabilities of the implementation of the BGP4-MIB. If this MIB implementation is platform-dependent, the PRODUCT-RELEASE clause contains Ericsson SEOS version and at least one of the following Ericsson product families: [SE] SmartEdge Multi-service Edge Router (MSER) family [SM] SM family of Metro Ethernet Service Transport platforms [SSR] Smart Service Router (SSR) family
